column5: Hey Everyone,  I keep seeing Jumla lures being mentioned but I am not aware of such a lure. Could some one please fill me in on the lure, or where I can get more info on it?  Thanx,  Stan
Avery Quesnel is the only place person I know that has them. I'm sure he will register here today at some point.
Jumla,,,,gotta have one especially for Quinte.  Most places I've been too have been sold out already.  Gman
Gotta talk directly to the boss as far as I know
I'm out of stock right now im waiting for some components to make another batch. I should have it done within a couple of weeks or so.  I have some orders i still have to fill.
You may want to make up a bunch for Lakair this year,I hear they are the bomb for tourney winning Pike!!! Joe
